bleeding: Lie down and try to stay calm.
Avoid inserting anything or taking medication unless advised.
Call your healthcare provider or emergency services immediately.
severe_abdominal_pain: Stop any activity and sit or lie down comfortably.
Try to identify the location and severity of the pain.
Call your healthcare provider or go to the nearest hospital.
high_fever: Check your temperature and stay hydrated.
Remove excess clothing to cool down.
Contact a health professional if temperature exceeds 38°C (100.4°F).
loss_of_consciousness: Do not leave the person alone until help arrives.

notes: Always carry your health card and ID. Share your emergency plan with a trusted family member or caregiver. Act fast — never ignore warning signs.
